alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Lackawanna; Luzerne; Northern Wayne; Pike; Southern Wayne; Susquehanna; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 29 at 9:29PM EST until January 30 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 24 below zero. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Southern Wayne, Bradford, Susquehanna, Pike, Lackawanna, Luzerne, Wyoming and Northern Wayne counties. In New York, Chenango, Cortland, Tompkins, Chemung, Schuyler, Steuben, Tioga, Broome, Onondaga, Madison, Southern Oneida, Yates, Seneca and Southern Cayuga counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northwest winds 10 to 20 mph, decreasing between 5 to 10 mph late tonight and Sunday morning
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Brings pets inside to protect them from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Lackawanna; Luzerne; Northern Wayne; Pike; Southern Wayne; Susquehanna; Wyoming
